title: Our Research Process
description: A structured approach to deliver actionable insights

steps.title: Its for End Client for full research services process:
steps.description: At Creative Consulting Services Limited, we follow a structured, efficient, and quality-driven process to deliver actionable insights. This step-by-step approach ensures transparency, accuracy, and value for every client project.

dittails.heading: Step 1: Understanding Client Objectives
dittails.description: Laying the Foundation for Relevant Research - We begin every project by understanding your unique needs and business challenges:
content: Conduct detailed discussions to define research goals
Identify your target audience, market scope, and information gaps
Suggest the right research methodology (Quantitative, Qualitative, or Hybrid)
This foundational step ensures the research is aligned with your decision-making needs.

dittails.heading: Step 2: Research Design & Planning
dittails.description: Structuring the Study for Clarity and Impact - We design a research framework that delivers accurate, decision-ready insights:
content: Prepare sampling plans and screener questionnaires
Develop tools for data collection such as IDI-FGD guides or survey scripts
Finalize study timeline, team structure, and logistics.
This planning phase ensures your project is strategically sound and operationally smooth.

dittails.heading: Step 3:  Recruitment & Training
dittails.description: Getting the Right People and Team in Place - Success in research begins with the right participants and skilled execution.
content: Recruit respondents based on agreed profiles and quotas
Conduct detailed training for interviewers/moderators with live role-plays
Pilot test tools to fix any gaps before launch.
We ensure readiness at every level—respondents and researchers.

dittails.heading: Step 4: Data Collection & Monitoring
dittails.description: Capturing Reliable Data through Real-Time Supervision - We carry out data collection through multiple channels while ensuring quality control.
content: Utilize platforms like Qualtrics, Survey CTO, Survey To Go, ViciDial and others
Monitor interviews and survey progress daily
Address quota management and logic issues in real time.
This step ensures field execution stays on-track and error-free.

dittails.heading: Step 5: Data Validation & Quality Control
dittails.description: Ensuring Accuracy and Clean Data Before Analysis -  Quality is non-negotiable—our QC process is rigorous and multilayered.
content: Validate entries through back-checks, audio reviews, and GPS tagging
Cross-check inconsistent or incomplete responses
Deliver clean and fully validated datasets.
You receive data that is trustworthy and ready for analysis.

dittails.heading: Step 6: Analysis & Insight Generation
dittails.description: Turning Data Into Business Intelligence -  Our researchers dig deep into data to uncover what matters most.
content: Use statistical tools or thematic coding to interpret findings
Highlight key drivers, challenges, and growth opportunities
Provide practical, decision-oriented recommendations.
Our insights are designed to support confident business actions.

dittails.heading: Step 7: Reporting & Delivery
dittails.description: Presenting Insights That Drive Results - We don’t just hand over data—we deliver clarity and confidence.
content: Submit comprehensive reports with visual summaries and actionable takeaways
Share raw data formats (SPSS, Excel, CSV) upon request
Offer virtual/in-person debriefs to align insights with your strategy.
We ensure you get the full value from the research investment.

steps.title: When we work with research company:
steps.description: Our Research Execution Support Process for Partner Agencies

dittails.heading: Step 1: Requirement Understanding & Alignment
dittails.description: Clarity First, Execution Next - We begin by fully understanding your project scope and expectations.
content: Review the brief, sample structure, target groups, and methodology
Discuss platforms, deliverables, timeline, and any localization needs
Align on roles: whether you handle scripting & analysis, and we handle field only
We ensure we’re completely aligned with your agency’s objectives and timelines.

dittails.heading: Step 2: Localization & Tool Preparation
dittails.description: Ensuring Your Tools Work Seamlessly in Our Market - We help adapt your survey tools or discussion guides for local use.
content: Translate scripts (if needed) and check for cultural relevancy
Test CATI/CAWI platforms or import surveys into tools like Qualtrics, Survey CTO, Survey To Go or ViciDial
Run test interviews/pilot sessions and share feedback
Our team ensures your global tools are locally effective.

dittails.heading: Step 3:  Recruitment & Logistics Setup
dittails.description: Finding the Right Respondents, Preparing the Right Setup - We recruit participants as per your defined criteria with full transparency.
content: Use in-house panels, referral systems, or on-ground mobilization
Share profiles and get your approval (if required)
Book venues, manage incentives, and arrange moderators/interviewers
We manage the fieldwork logistics so you can focus on the research.

dittails.heading: Step 4: Fieldwork Execution & Monitoring
dittails.description: Executing the Plan with Transparency and Control - We carry out fieldwork according to your specs, with daily updates.
content: Conduct CATI, F2F, IDIs, FGDs, or ethnos as required
Share call recordings or session videos (if permitted)
Provide daily progress reports, quota trackers, and issue logs
You stay in control—even remotely—through real-time visibility.

dittails.heading: Step 5:  Quality Control & Data Delivery
dittails.description: Delivering Trusted Data with Proven QC Checks - We apply strict quality control across all projects.
content: Conduct back-checks, call verifications, and GPS validation
Review logic flags, open-end completeness, and consistency
Deliver raw data (Excel, SPSS, CSV) with documentation
We guarantee the quality and reliability your client expects from you.

dittails.heading: Step 6: Debrief & Closure
dittails.description: Wrap-Up with Transparency & Final Deliverables - We close each project with full transparency and documentation.
content: Final summary of fieldwork execution
Sharing of raw files, transcripts, screeners, and materials
Debrief session with your team (optional) for future improvements
We aim to be your long-term partner—not just a vendor.
